duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide age-appropriate, culturally and ethnically sensitive care, and maintain a safe environment for patients.
Educate patients and their families about healthy practices and treatment modalities.
Assure continuity of care and coordinate care across settings and among caregivers.
Manage information, communicate effectively, and utilize technology in patient care.
Utilize the nursing process including assessment, nurse diagnosis, outcomes identification, planning and coordination, implementation, and evaluation.
Advocate for patients, teach, and participate in performance improvement, leadership, and professional development.

education_certification.credential: Associates Degree in Nursing required. Bachelors Degree in Nursing preferred.
